function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne virus transmission in confined spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing, increasing ventilation rates, and studying occupant behavior and other factors","Technologies":"Prediction models, HVAC systems with high ventilation rates, and energy-efficient building designs","People":"Occupants of confined spaces, building occupants, and the general public","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities, and researchers"},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on industries and economies","Impact":"Disabling industries, causing financial damage, and disrupting global economies","Mitigation":"Implementing safety measures, supporting affected industries, and investing in research and innovation","Technologies":"Digital technologies for remote work, financial support systems, and vaccine development","People":"Workers, business owners, and global populations","Owner":"Government, industry leaders, and researchers"},{"Description":"Need for comprehensive study of COVID-19","Impact":"Lack of comprehensive understanding and delayed development of effective control measures","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough research and filling gaps in existing literature","Technologies":"Research activities, data analysis tools, and collaborative research platforms","People":"Researchers, healthcare professionals, and policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations, and governmental health agencies"}]}
